about.title: Crafting Memories Beyond The Ordinary
about.p1: Founded by Bertin Jerald Lazarus & Ronald Seagal Varghese, LazSpace Holidays is built on trust, transparency, and real experiences. We focus on curated tours—crafting meaningful journeys rather than mass packages.
about.p2: Though we are proudly based in Kerala, our connections and expertise span globally, ensuring every trip you take is deeply memorable, expertly planned, and flawlessly executed.

services.title: Our Expertise
services.subtitle: Curated services tailored for distinct travel needs, delivered with absolute precision and care.
services.c1Text: Stress-free, engaging, and memorable vacations designed perfectly for all age groups in the family.
services.c2Text: Team building retreats, MICE events, and executive travel managed with utmost professional precision.
services.c3Text: Join like-minded travelers on our carefully crafted, highly sought-after group departure dates.
services.c4Text: Opulent stays, private transfers, and VIP access across elite destinations globally.
services.c5Text: Your dream, our blueprint. 100% personalized travel plans tailored to your exact pacing and interests.
services.c6Text: Exchanging vows in paradise. Comprehensive travel and logistics for your big day.
services.c7Text: Experiential local tours. Discover the hidden heritage, culture, and flavors of our home city.

destinations.title: Featured Destinations
destinations.subtitle: Hand-picked, deeply researched locations for your next transformative adventure.
destinations.c1Text: God's Own Country. Backwaters, hills, and pristine beaches.
destinations.c2Text: Delhi, Agra, Jaipur. The classic majestic North Indian circuit.
destinations.c3Text: Witness the great migration and the wild wonders of the savannah.
destinations.c4Text: Bali, Thailand, Vietnam. A blend of culture, luxury, and tropical life.

testimonials.quote: The level of detail Bertin and the LazSpace team provided for our corporate retreat in Kerala was unmatched. Truly a premium experience without the typical travel agency stress. Highly recommended for professionals looking for quality.

itinerary.title: Kerala Classic Premium
itinerary.subtitle: 6 Days / 5 Nights • Kochi - Munnar - Alleppey - Marari
itinerary.overviewText: Experience the absolute best of God's Own Country. This premium, hand-crafted itinerary takes you from the historic streets of Fort Kochi to the misty tea gardens of Munnar, cruising the backwaters on a luxury houseboat, and relaxing on the pristine Marari beach. Designed for discerning travelers seeking comfort and cultural immersion.
itinerary.h1: Private guided walking tour of historic Fort Kochi
itinerary.h2: Stay in a premium boutique plantation resort in Munnar
itinerary.h3: Exclusive overnight luxury houseboat cruise with private chef
itinerary.h4: Relaxation at a 5-star beach resort in Marari
itinerary.day1Title: Day 1: Arrival in Kochi & Heritage Walk
itinerary.day1Text: Arrive at Cochin International Airport. Our chauffeur will greet you and transfer you to a premium heritage hotel in Fort Kochi. In the afternoon, enjoy a private guided walking tour covering the Chinese Fishing Nets, St. Francis Church, and the Jewish Synagogue. Evening sunset cruise on the harbor.
itinerary.day2Text: After breakfast, a scenic drive to the hill station of Munnar (approx. 4 hours). Check into your boutique plantation resort. Afternoon visit to the Tea Museum to understand the history of tea processing, followed by a walk through the lush green tea gardens.
itinerary.day3Text: Full day exploring Munnar. Visit the Eravikulam National Park (home to the endangered Nilgiri Tahr), the Mattupetty Dam, and Echo Point. Evening at leisure to enjoy the cool mountain climate and resort amenities.
itinerary.day4Text: Drive down to Alleppey (approx. 5 hours) to board your private luxury Kettuvallam (houseboat) by noon. Cruise through the tranquil backwaters, Vembanad Lake, and narrow canals. Experience authentic Kerala village life. All meals prepared fresh on board by your personal chef. Overnight on the houseboat.
itinerary.day5Text: Disembark the houseboat after breakfast and take a short drive to Marari Beach. Check into a luxury beach resort. Spend the day relaxing by the pristine, quiet beach, indulging in Ayurvedic spa treatments (optional), or a swim in the ocean.
itinerary.day6Text: Enjoy a leisurely breakfast and some final beach time. Check out and drive back to Cochin International Airport (approx. 2.5 hours) for your onward journey, carrying beautiful memories of Kerala.
itinerary.i1: 5 nights accommodation in premium/luxury 4* and 5* properties
itinerary.i2: Daily breakfast at hotels, and all meals on the houseboat
itinerary.i3: Private air-conditioned Toyota Innova Crysta for all transfers and sightseeing
itinerary.i4: English-speaking professional chauffeur and local guides in Kochi
itinerary.e2: Any meals not mentioned in inclusions
itinerary.e4: Personal expenses like laundry, tips, telephone calls
